alert.note: Alert for Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 27 at 5:45AM AKDT until March 27 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow, blowing snow, and low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off from the west this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
